title: Daily Reminder that Wards have Attack Speed
body:
So why doesn't Warwicks W give them bonus attack speed?

edit: also if they are taunted why are they not attacking? they have a team unlike scuttle crab

replies.body:
> So why doesn't Warwicks W give them bonus attack speed?

No ears, can't hear his call.

well played
http://philly.barstoolsports.com/files/2013/06/slow-clap.gif
Are you a new rioter? Cause i dunno about everyone else on boards but i fuking love you

> [{quoted}](name=RiotRepertoir,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kXQK2nF5,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-08-13T17:08:16.765+0000)
>
> No ears, can't hear his call.

What about Rek'Sai?
She should get 3x the buff. {{item:3751}} {{champion:421}} {{item:3751}} And then watch the world burn.
this is comment is driving me crazy
I await your scholarly analysis of why Blood Boil also fails.
Wards don't have blood.
Neither does Orianna.
Also, Wards' profile pictures have an eye, but real wards don't have eyes. Damn photoshop!
I think Laughing Fish and Repertoir are the same person
There is only Repertoir.  Everyone else is just a figment of Repertoir's subconscious imagination.  We are only a fleeting dream.
Not  even if it's a Poro ?
Poros don't have stats afaik. Basically they are immortal and immune to interaction.
murder bridge's cookies beg to differ
I meant a Poro Ward.
oh boy, now people are going to complain that sated devourer is op on wards
"Their team has so much gold, their wards each have 6 {{item:3078}}, *and* an upgraded trinket."

{{item:3361}} Legend has it some men dare to find this item.
He who buys it, gains untold riches in immortality from gankerinos

>even wards upgrade trinket

meanwhile, at low elo...

dont they also have movement speed?

i think item actives like righteous glory or sivirs ult should work on them aswell. justice for wards!

I think Garen should be able to ult wards (putting his ult on a 15 second cooldown). Not even wards can escape justice. 
http://i.giflike.com/ph5FKPA.gif
*does one damage*
It would scale off of the wards missing health. If it still had 3 hp, he would do 1 damage. But if it only had 2 left he would kill it.
But only if they were the last one to kill an enemy, so he can ult the criminals.
Graves should be able to smoke bomb them too.
Probably coded as minions.
Is there ANYTHING you can't code as a minion? I bet turrets are just coded as really strong cannon minions.

> [{quoted}](name=KimJongUlt,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kXQK2nF5,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-08-13T15:39:33.122+0000)
>
> Is there ANYTHING you can't code as a minion? I bet turrets are just coded as really strong cannon minions.

Gates are coded as ghosted minions that don't collide with allies.
Which is like.. Actually really cool.

> [{quoted}](name=BoxOfDOG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kXQK2nF5,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2015-08-13T15:55:50.261+0000)
>
> Gates are **coded** as ghosted minions that don't collide with allies.
> Which is like.. Actually really cool.

yes i am ghosted minions that dont collide with allies

> [{quoted}](name=Coded,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=kXQK2nF5,comment-id=0004000000000001,timestamp=2015-08-13T17:12:18.671+0000)
>
> yes i am ghosted minions that dont collide with allies

http://37.media.tumblr.com/ba40d1e4190e9610cf291ced34bb0fbb/tumblr_n3zf5mxM0g1txudn8o4_500.gif
But wait if you had phantom dancer wouldnt you be able to walk right through then?

Yeah I remember reading one of the reds talking about that in the context of why they're sometimes awkeard to get or auto path through. Creative little workaround to the one-way issue. That's actually what inspired my original comment.
If you can't teleport to it, and it isn't a structure, it's probably not a minion.
{{item:2044}} can have attack speed, but {{champion:104}}  can't have a cigar.
Meanwhile teemo mushrooms have 160 movement speed and 10 AD
Have you tried using Galio wind gust and use l lense to reveal over it? I guess there are alot of tiny wards there XD

that would be hilarious
Shen taunts through a bush, starts getting attacked by a ward lool
Note that Zz'rot portal has 10 AD and 0.6 attack speed
Wards are people too!
How do you expect Teemo to be a good champ with not attack speed?

Cause then it would give minions bonus attack speed too, probably. And that could be terrifying.

...fear the razorfins...
Terrifying yes, but it would also make Warwick much more viable outside of jungle.
{{item:3512}} Max W Warwick splitpush. That would be funny as fuck.
Wards have stubby arms and nothing else to attack with. Therefore they cannot attack, and will not attack when taunted.
**WARDS ARE PEOPLE TOO**
Also scuttle has attack damage when he never attacks.
#wardsarepeopletoo
Turrets got items too.
